channel.title: Notes on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Arrans github.io

item.title: toeverything/AFFiNE
item.description: There can be more than Notion and Miro. AFFiNE(pronounced [ə‘fain]) is a next-gen knowledge base that brings planning, sorting and creating all together. Privacy first, open-source, customizable and ready to use.

item.title: pbek/QOwnNotes
item.description: QOwnNotes is a plain-text file notepad and todo-list manager with Markdown support and Nextcloud / ownCloud integration.

item.title: xournalpp/xournalpp
item.description: Xournal++ is a handwriting notetaking software with PDF annotation support. Written in C++ with GTK3, supporting Linux (e.g. Ubuntu, Debian, Arch, SUSE), macOS and Windows 10. Supports pen input from devices such as Wacom Tablets.

item.title: owlistic-notes/owlistic
item.description: 🦉 Free open-source notetaking app with real-time sync 🔄⚡️🚀
